Nikkei rallies to 3-month high as U.S.-China worries ease for now ... cyclical securities brokerages and shippers were among best-performing sectors on the main bourse, up 2.3% and 1.8%, respectively. Chipmaking-related stocks also did well after the U.S. Philadelphia semiconductor index gained 2.7% on Friday on hopes of strong demand related to new technologies such as 5G wireless communications. Screen Holdings Co Ltd climbed 5.3%, while Tokyo Electron rose 4.1% and Advantest Corp jumped 6.4%. Elsewhere, the index of Mothers start-up shares advanced as much as 2.0% to clear the 1,000 mark for the first time since early December 2018. The broader Topix edged up 0.5% to 1,571.34 though decliners outnumbered gainers by a ratio of 54 to 46. (Reporting by Tomo Uetake; Editing by Jacqueline Wong) Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters ...
